You curl your fingers into fists. Rah sees you, gulps, and does the same. You're going to fight this worker, and get to the bottom of this stupid thing. The worker opens the door, with a crazy looking mask on. The mask looks like a welder's mask, but more extravagant.

Rah runs up to the man and throws a fist for their chest. Almost effortlessly, the purplesuit sidesteps them and shuvs them off of the boat. Rah screams as they fall into the water. You run at the purplesuit, but they're prepared. They counter and headbut you, metal mask to exposed face. You fall to the ground with a blunt thud. The last thing you see before going unconscious is the foot of the worker looming over you.

You roll around. Something is stopping your normal movement. You can't see and you think your in a bag.
